code:
(define/contract (count-k-subsequences-with-max-beauty s k)
  (-> string? exact-integer? exact-integer?)
  (let ([mod 1000000007]
        [frequencies (make-hash)])
    (for ([c (in-string s)])
      (hash-update! frequencies c add1 0))
    (define sorted-frequencies (sort (hash-values frequencies) >))
    (define (nCr n r)
      (if (= r 0) 1
          (modulo (* (/ n r) (nCr (- n 1) (- r 1))) mod)))
    (if (<= k (length sorted-frequencies))
        (let* ([max-beauty (apply + (take sorted-frequencies k))]
               [max-count (count (lambda (x) (= x max-beauty)) (take sorted-frequencies k))]
               [freq-of-max (hash-ref frequencies max-beauty 0)])
          (nCr freq-of-max max-count))
        0)))
